reference.title: javafield
reference.shortdesc: The <javafield> element is a reference to a Java field.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <javafield> element can be used to reference a Java field from another topic type.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <task id="httpxml"> <title>Getting an XML file through an HTTP connection</title> <taskbody> <steps> <step><cm>Open the connection</cm> <info>You can use <javafield keyref="com.ibm.xtools.patterns.framework.uml2.AbstractImportEngineTask.IDD">IDD field (AbstractImportEngineTask)</javafield> in a Java application.</info> </step> ... </steps> </taskbody> </task>
